<script type="text/javascript" defer="defer">
function isEnter(inField, e) {
    var charCode;
    
    if(e && e.which){
        charCode = e.which;
    }else if(window.event){
        e = window.event;
        charCode = e.keyCode;
    }

    if(charCode == 13) {
       $('#ctl00_ctl00_bodyContent_leftContent_productFinder_btnSearch').click();
       return false;
    } 
    return true;
}

	  function setSelectedItem(list, value) {
           var i = 0;
           for (i = 0; i < document.getElementById(list).options.length; ++i) {
               if (document.getElementById(list).options[i].value == value) {
                   document.getElementById(list).options[i].selected = "selected";
                   break;
               }
           }
		   if (list == "subcategories")
		   {
		      $("#"+list).trigger("change");
		   }
       }

		function cascadeSelect(parent, child){
				var childOptions = child.find('option:not(.static)');
					child.data('options',childOptions);
	
				parent.change(function(){
				    if (this.name == "subcategories")
				    {
						document.getElementById('hid_subcategories').value = this.options[this.selectedIndex].text;
						childOptions.remove();
					    child.append(child.data('options').filter('.' + this.value))
						child.change(function(){document.getElementById('hid_families').value = this.options[this.selectedIndex].text});
				    } else {			   
					    childOptions.remove();
					    child
					        .append(child.data('options').filter('.' + this.value))
						    .change();
					}
				})
	
				childOptions.not('.static, .' + parent.val()).remove();

		}
				
		$(function(){
			cascadeForm = $('.cascadeTest');
			orgSelect = cascadeForm.find('.sensors');
			terrSelect = cascadeForm.find('.subcategories');
			locSelect = cascadeForm.find('.families');
			
			cascadeSelect(orgSelect, terrSelect);
			cascadeSelect(terrSelect, locSelect);
			
		});
</script>
